page.title: 15BIRCH ROAD RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: BIRCH ROAD RECREATION CENTRE The Birch Road Recreation Centre was opened in 1981.It has lots of sports available like boxing,ju-jitsu,keep fit,five-a-side football and karate.The centre is open to the public from 3.30pm till about 11.00pm.There is no membership needed to use the centre.The local schools use the centre during the day.The main hall has netball,volleyball,basketball and badminton courts.There are also squash courts and a weight training room.From a survey we did of fifty people,forty two didn't know it was there and only five used it.Forty six people thought a full time leisure centre would be a good idea then more people would know about it and it would be useful to those who are unemployed.
